user_query: I'm planning a family vacation and I want to keep in touch with my relatives through WhatsApp. Can you check the status of my phone number and provide me with the QR code for my phone? Also, can you suggest some funny messages for me to share with my family?

TaskList.description: Check the status of the provided phone number to ensure it is active and can be used for WhatsApp.
Generate a QR code for the active WhatsApp number so that family can easily connect with you.
Compile a list of funny messages suitable for sharing with family on WhatsApp during the vacation.
